about_the_game:
Explore the Dark and Dangerous Temples and Tombs of Ancient Egypt in Exodus Vigil. Follow the familiar story of the Israelite Exodus from the Egyptian perspective.

Features and Content:
  • 10 missions with a variety of puzzles, exploration, and navigating/climbing through both indoor and outdoor locales
  • Cinematics and in-game cut scenes with voices based on the historical fiction novel "Exodus: God of the Slaves"
  • Total 14 different characters, both male and female, multiple ethnicities, to play as
  • Ride a chariot through the Egyptian streets

EXPERIENCE THE ISRAELITE EXODUS FROM AN EGYPTIAN PERSPECTIVE

Based on the book, "Exodus: God of the Slaves" by Kris Murray, a new God comes to Egypt and sends His emissary. Four young Egyptians witness the wonder as disasters befall their homeland. Feel their emotions as war rages across their pantheon. Relive the familiar Exodus story set in the exotic land of ancient Egypt from a fresh new perspective.

SOLVE FUN AND CHALLENGING PUZZLES

Use your wits and reflexes to discover exciting places, navigate treacherous passages, and escape from temple zealots. Climb to new heights, muscle your way through, sneak passed enemies, blend into the crowd, or draw your blade as a last resort.

EXPLORE TEMPLES AND TOMBS

The slaves of the pharaohs worked tirelessly to build elaborate pyramids, burial chambers, and grand temples. Find out what lurks behind the next corner of these dark corridors. Can you successfully figure out the secrets to solve the challenges that await?

SPECIAL NOTE: Some Localized Windows players in non-USA countries (e.g. Germany) are experiencing game-breaking issues so we do not recommend purchasing this game if you are using a localized version of Microsoft Windows outside the USA. Continue checking this page for updates regarding this known issue.

short_description: Exodus Vigil is a small Indie Studio developed puzzle adventure game designed for middle & high school academic students to learn how to build & publish their own games. Explore the Dark and Dangerous Temples and Tombs of Ancient Egypt in this story-driven 3D puzzle adventure game.
